description: This file provides a helper module for establishing and maintaining a MongoDB connection in the LudoMaster project. It includes functions to retrieve the database instance and MongoClient, managing a singleton connection synchronized across the application.

methods.name: getDb
methods.description: Returns the connected MongoDB database instance, establishing a connection if necessary, based on environment variables.

methods.name: getClient
methods.description: Returns the MongoClient instance, ensuring a connection is established beforehand.
